name: Frequency (Ice Studios)
description:
Frequency is a deep, immersive, new narrative experience that combines pleasing voice acting, ideal music and sound effects with a stunning 3D environment to make you feel like you are there, living every moment beside the characters in this interactive branching story.

You will play the role of a lone, pragmatic ranger, named Noah. Noah is at home when suddenly hears something through the radio... a voice calling for help. That is Eliza.

Eliza is in grave danger, someone is after her. The friends she was with are missing, she is alone, and her radio can only reach your frequency. You will help Eliza make tough decisions and face the consequences together.

You will have a limited amount of time to make a choice. Fail to choose in time and one will be chosen for you randomly.

Eliza is counting on you, don't let her down.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Background Story:

FOLLOWING A GLOBAL CATASTROPHE THAT HAD MAJOR REPERCUSSIONS ON THE FINANCIAL, POLITICAL AND SOCIAL SYSTEMS, I.C.E. (INNOVATIVE CONTROL OF EQUALITY), A NEW FORMED POLITICAL PARTY, TRIED TO RESTORE ORDER. THE PARTY IS BASED ON TOTALITARIAN, BARBARIC CONTROL WITH A SINGLE PRINCIPLE, DEATH AS RESULT OF
DISOBEDIENCE.

IN EUROPE, COUNTRIES SUCH AS NETHERLANDS, DENMARK AND SWITZERLAND HAVE OPPOSED AND SUCCEEDED IN RECREATING A SYSTEM THAT WOULD PROTECT THEIR OWN INHABITANTS. THESE COUNTRIES ARE NOW CALLED WHITE ZONES AND THIS GLOBAL STATE IS KNOWN AS
THE DOWNFALL.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


You can play Frequency in English and Romanian. More translations will be available with future updates.

No in-app purchases and no ads. Internet connection is not required.

Frequency can now be played on tablets too!
